'''Weathered Obelisks''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Sumeru]].

Weathered Obelisks come in paired sets, one set glows and can be altered by the player's characters attacking the obelisk. Manipulating these glowing symbols to match the unchangeable symbols on the other obelisk exactly will grant a [[Chest]].

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial|Weathered Obelisk}}

==Trivia==
* The Weathered Obelisks contain letters from the [[Deshret Script]]. The letters corresponding to F, H, N, P, R, S, T, V, and Z appear in Weathered Obelisk puzzles.{{Verify}}
